field_label: Japan tourist visa – single entry (up to 15 days stay)
notes: Cost: 6,000 RUB. Processing time: 10–12 business days.
Passport valid at least 3 months after visa expiry; provide current passport + second valid passport and old cancelled passports (if any).
2 color photos on white background, 4.5×4.5 cm, no hat; face should cover ~80% of photo.
Questionnaire must be completed (download link referenced in the PDF).
From employer, stating position and salary (preferably from 30,000 RUB).

Birth certificate copy; school/university certificate; notarized consent to travel if not with both parents + copy of parent’s internal passport; sponsor work certificate (salary preferably ≥30,000 RUB); free-form sponsorship letter.
The Consulate has the right to delay issuance of completed documents.
